original_text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.
korean_text: 네 형제가 죄를 범하거든 가서 너와 그 사람과만 상대하여 권고하라 만일 들으면 네가 네 형제를 얻은 것이요

sentences.original_text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 만약 네 형제가 너에게 죄를 짓는다면

sentences.original_text: go and tell him his fault
